Loot Events.description: You encounter a derelict ship drifting in space, its cargo hold still intact.
Loot Events.action: Board the ship and retrieve any valuable resources.
Loot Events.outcome: Gain random loot items and possibly rare tech components.

Loot Events.description: An ancient relic is found floating among the debris, seemingly unguarded.
Loot Events.action: Secure the relic and analyze its origins.
Loot Events.outcome: Gain a valuable artifact that can be sold for credits or used in research.

Loot Events.description: You discover a hidden stash of supplies left behind by smugglers.
Loot Events.action: Collect the supplies before anyone else notices.
Loot Events.outcome: Gain a small amount of credits and essential supplies.

Loot Events.description: A damaged cargo pod drifts nearby, still broadcasting a distress signal.
Loot Events.action: Retrieve the pod and inspect its contents.
Loot Events.outcome: Gain random resources and a potential clue to its origin.

Loot Events.description: You find an abandoned station with intact storage units.
Loot Events.action: Explore the station and claim any usable items.
Loot Events.outcome: Gain resources and possibly a rare piece of equipment.

Lore Events.description: You find a beacon transmitting a message from an ancient war.
Lore Events.action: Listen to the message and decode its contents.
Lore Events.outcome: Learn more about the historical conflicts of the system.

Lore Events.description: A derelict station contains old data logs from a long-lost civilization.
Lore Events.action: Download the logs and analyze the data.
Lore Events.outcome: Gain insight into the history and culture of the lost civilization.

Lore Events.description: You discover a monument dedicated to an old galactic alliance.
Lore Events.action: Examine the monument and record its details.
Lore Events.outcome: Unlock new lore entries and gain a small amount of faction reputation.

Lore Events.description: A mysterious object drifts by, inscribed with ancient symbols.
Lore Events.action: Investigate the object and decipher the symbols.
Lore Events.outcome: Reveal hidden lore about the system's past.

Lore Events.description: You encounter a drifting probe that was launched centuries ago.
Lore Events.action: Recover the probe and access its data banks.
Lore Events.outcome: Uncover details of a forgotten exploration mission.

Combat Events.description: A group of space raiders ambushes you as you enter the system.
Combat Events.action: Defend yourself and eliminate the raiders.
Combat Events.outcome: Gain combat experience and loot from the raiders.

Combat Events.description: You are targeted by a rogue AI drone that has gone berserk.
Combat Events.action: Destroy the drone before it can call for reinforcements.
Combat Events.outcome: Gain salvage from the wreckage and increase faction standing.

Combat Events.description: A rival faction's patrol challenges your presence in the system.
Combat Events.action: Engage in combat or attempt to negotiate passage.
Combat Events.outcome: Victory grants faction points; negotiation may cost credits or favors.

Combat Events.description: A pirate fleet is blockading the system’s primary trade route.
Combat Events.action: Break the blockade and clear the route for other ships.
Combat Events.outcome: Earn credits from grateful traders and a boost in faction reputation.

Combat Events.description: A dangerous alien predator attacks your ship as you scan the system.
Combat Events.action: Fight off the predator or evade it to continue your mission.
Combat Events.outcome: Surviving grants rare biological samples or increased exploration data.

United Systems of Man.description: A high-ranking officer requests your assistance in a delicate matter.
United Systems of Man.action: Aid the officer in securing a diplomatic agreement.
United Systems of Man.outcome: Gain faction points and a valuable contact within the faction.

United Systems of Man.description: You encounter a stranded USM convoy in need of repairs.
United Systems of Man.action: Assist the convoy by providing spare parts or towing them to safety.
United Systems of Man.outcome: Earn faction points and a modest credit reward.

Mandate of God.description: The Mandate requests assistance with securing a new colony site.
Mandate of God.action: Scout the location and eliminate any threats.
Mandate of God.outcome: Gain faction points and a resource reward.

Mandate of God.description: A Mandate fleet needs help escorting a religious artifact.
Mandate of God.action: Protect the fleet from potential attackers.
Mandate of God.outcome: Gain faction points and a special blessing item.

People of the River.description: A River faction merchant offers a lucrative trade deal.
People of the River.action: Negotiate terms and facilitate the trade.
People of the River.outcome: Earn faction points and a share of the profits.

People of the River.description: The River faction needs help distributing supplies to a remote outpost.
People of the River.action: Deliver the supplies and ensure the outpost's security.
People of the River.outcome: Gain faction points and a unique item as a thank-you.

Shogunate 3072.description: A Shogunate warrior challenges you to a duel for honor.
Shogunate 3072.action: Accept the duel and prove your strength.
Shogunate 3072.outcome: Winning increases faction respect and gains a rare weapon.

Shogunate 3072.description: The Shogunate requests your aid in securing a strategic location.
Shogunate 3072.action: Assist in the military operation and secure the site.
Shogunate 3072.outcome: Gain faction points and access to exclusive Shogunate technology.

The Noringian Hive.description: The Hive requests assistance with a research project on a volatile gas giant.
The Noringian Hive.action: Collect samples and data from the dangerous atmosphere.
The Noringian Hive.outcome: Gain faction points and valuable research credits.

The Noringian Hive.description: A Hive queen seeks resources to fortify her domain.
The Noringian Hive.action: Gather and deliver the requested resources.
The Noringian Hive.outcome: Earn faction points and a rare biological sample.

Resource Events.description: You discover a rich vein of minerals on an uncharted asteroid.
Resource Events.action: Mine the minerals before any competitors arrive.
Resource Events.outcome: Collect valuable resources and gain mining experience.

Resource Events.description: A sudden solar flare has charged nearby asteroids with rare elements.
Resource Events.action: Harvest the charged elements while avoiding radiation damage.

Resource Events.description: A drifting cargo pod is filled with valuable gases from a distant system.
Resource Events.action: Secure the pod and extract the gases.
Resource Events.outcome: Gain resources and a small faction bonus.

Resource Events.description: A derelict mining station still has operational equipment.
Resource Events.action: Reactivate the equipment and collect the resources.
Resource Events.outcome: Harvest minerals and potentially find a rare tech component.

Resource Events.description: You locate a hidden cache of refined ores, left behind by a hasty retreat.
Resource Events.action: Collect the ores and decide whether to sell or keep them.
Resource Events.outcome: Gain resources and a choice of immediate credits or faction points.

Exploration Events.description: You find an anomaly emitting unusual energy readings.
Exploration Events.action: Investigate the anomaly to uncover its secrets.
Exploration Events.outcome: Discover a rare artifact or gain significant exploration experience.

Exploration Events.description: A newly formed comet passes through the system, rich in rare minerals.
Exploration Events.action: Survey the comet and collect samples.
Exploration Events.outcome: Gain valuable resources and exploration points.

Exploration Events.description: An ancient probe orbits the system, transmitting data from a long-lost mission.
Exploration Events.action: Recover the probe and analyze its data.
Exploration Events.outcome: Unlock a hidden star map or gain a unique item.

Exploration Events.description: You encounter a hidden cave system on a barren moon.
Exploration Events.action: Explore the caves and see what secrets they hold.
Exploration Events.outcome: Find a rare mineral deposit or an abandoned hideout.

Exploration Events.description: A cluster of derelict ships surrounds a mysterious spatial rift.
Exploration Events.action: Explore the rift and salvage what you can.
Exploration Events.outcome: Gain rare resources and a deeper understanding of the anomaly.
